sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_install_base_m2m_affected_install_base</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_install_base_m2m_affected_install_base">csm_case.accountISNOTEMPTY^ORcsm_case.consumerISNOTEMPTY^ORcsm_case.householdISNOTEMPTY^ORcsm_case.requesting_service_organizationISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="csm_case.account" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="csm_case.consumer" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="csm_case.household" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="true" value=""/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>validate account consumer & product</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var entity = []; var inputVars = { 'account': current.csm_case.account, 'contact': current.csm_case.contact, 'consumer': current.csm_case.consumer, 'household': current.csm_case.household, 'requesting_service_organization': current.csm_case.requesting_service_organization, 'product': current.csm_case.product, 'cmdb_ci': current.csm_case.cmdb_ci, 'asset': current.csm_case.asset, 'install_base': current.install_base_item, }; entity = new sn_install_base.InstallBaseUtil().validateInstallBaseCaseRecord(inputVars); if (entity.length > 0) { current.setAbortAction(true); gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('These fields need to be same in both install base and case records : {0}.', entity.join(','))); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-14 07:20:43</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>2c5accbbb74433003a2e2397ee11a9e5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>validate account consumer & product</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Install Base Management" source="sn_install_base">7f1fc05477122300d7159b71a91061b7</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service Install Base Management">7f1fc05477122300d7159b71a91061b7</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2c5accbbb74433003a2e2397ee11a9e5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-29 01:59:10</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2c5accbbb74433003a2e2397ee11a9e5"/> </record_update>
